edu.cnm.deepdive.checkyourself.fragments

Class HomeFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.checkyourself.fragments.HomeFragment

  • public class HomeFragment
extends Object
    HomeFragment displays a graph that shows the remaining percentage of the categories in the budgets. It also contains four text views that display the actual dollar value remaining. The last part of the fragment is the Google Map that display's at the bottom to enable the location services and notification to work as intended, showing all the requested POI's and geofences.
    Author:
    Jake Batchelor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HomeFragment.GetNearbyPlacesData
      An AsyncTask that makes a request to Google API's(Maps and Places) to get the POI's around the requested location, mark certain types with markers, and put a geofence on each POI as well.
